text:
Appraisd | NW5, London UK | C# Full Stack Dev 2+yrs, UX/UI designer/developer | Full Time | ONSITE

I'm the founder of Appraisd and we are building an employee engagement and performance management tool with a strong emphasis on employee-first design and usability. We have 100s of clients all around the world yet we are still a small lean team. However, we need to GROW! We have immediate availability for a C# Full Stack Dev with 2+ years experience, and a UX/UI designer/developer.

Tech stack: Azure / SQL / C# .net MVC / WebAPI / VueJs / Typescript.

More at: https://workinstartups.com/job-board/job/74036/full-stack-cv... and https://workinstartups.com/job-board/job/73643/uxui-lead-con...
